Detailed Description

Exception thrown when there's some kind of logic inconsistency in the program. Should never happen, of course ... it's a kind of assertion. This is a subclass of RuntimeException, so that it doesn't need to be specified everywhere.

Version:
Id
LogicException.java,v 1.4 2005/01/30 15:13:42 ilyad Exp
